nodes.text: Robes, also known as cowls, were loose-fitting clothes with sleeves. The Jedi and Sith both often wore robes beneath a cloak, and the Jedi had their own particular style of robes. Darth Sidious wore a hooded zeyd cloth robe, while Darth Vader and the Imperial Guard wore robes with armor. Jawas wore robes with a hooded cowl.
Folding one's hands in front of them, such that they were obscured by their robes, was considered the most formal way one Jedi could address another.
Leia Organa often wore the simple, white robes of a princess, which helped to keep her enemies off guard.
